content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -47.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -48.5) transferring iron ore from the mining drill to the furnace

### Stone Furnace at Initial Position
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map.

### Errors when crafting without required sub-ingredients
- Verify that all sub-ingredients are available in your inventory or can be crafted before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Check your inventory to ensure you have the items you intend to insert into another entity.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting placement. Consider adjusting the spacing or direction if the desired position is occupied.

### Errors related to output blockage
- Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output from the mining drill to prevent blockage.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients for smelting
- Make sure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before operation.
